PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-08632011-07-29,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectKathy L. Bentley, Margot Cooper and McKenzie Bentley-Little **SURVIVOR'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Donald M. Cooper
PrecisGranting of an annuity a) to KATHY L. BENTLEY, widow of the Hon. Donald M. Cooper, Judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories, and b) to each of the children MARGOT COOPER and MCKENZIE BENTLEY-LITTLE, effective March 29, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
